message: Hey Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll really like. I'm offering it to you for $200. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I can't go quite that low. How about we meet in the middle at $170?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I can only go up to $140. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
